titles.title: In the Matter of James A. Traficant, Jr.

action.text: The House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-594, by Mr. Hefley.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 197.

action.text: Mr. LaTourette moved to postpone consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on the LaTourette motion to postpone consideration of H.Res 495 until 9/04/2002.
On motion to postpone consideration Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 285 (Roll no. 345).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 495.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 420 - 1, 9 Present ) (Roll No. 346).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/19/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Expels Representative James A. Traficant, Jr. from the House of Representatives.
